participant_1.background:
I have a job that allows me to work from home so I can spend more time with my family.
my shyness made me panick and i didn t show up.
I dropped the dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house.
I live in the suburbs so that I can be close to my family and friends, but I also enjoy visiting the city to see my best friend and play cello with her.
I'd brag about my ability to stay focused and motivated, even when things get tough.

participant_2.background:
I like to wear the same pants every day so I don't have to think about what to wear.
I enjoy helping my community by serving on the city council.
i love the rain.
I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy.
my favorite basketball team is the vancouver grizzlies.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for a living?
I work on the city council, helping to make our community a better place.
Wow, that's really impressive! How do you stay focused on your work?
I love my job and I'm really passionate about making a difference. I also have a lot of support from my family and friends.
That's great! Do you have any hobbies?
I love playing basketball. I also love mangoes! They're so sweet and juicy.
I love mangoes too! I've never been to Vancouver, but I've heard great things about it.
It's a beautiful city! You should definitely visit sometime.
I'd love to! What are some of your favorite things to do there?
I love going to the mountains and hiking. There are so many beautiful trails to explore.
That sounds amazing! I love hiking too.
We should go hiking together sometime!
